Who are JWB?
JWB are a group of friends that play all kinds of games together, below is a list of some of our most played games:
League of Legends

Yup, that's right, we're basic ass bitches too! We love hopping into the summoners rift for some cheeky LoL.

Minecraft - FTB

Recently we've been getting into the FTB Revelations hype, just like all your favourite streamers!

Among us

Want to destroy frendships and rage at other people? come join us in a game of Among us and wonder how all these dysfunctional people managed to find eachother.
